comment: Primary Key for the LOCATION table.

description: Zip code of the location. For US addresses, supports 3-digit, 5-digit, or 9-digit (ZIP + 4).
comment: Zip code handling as a string.

description: Verbatim value for the location as it appears in the source.
Concept ID representing the country, conforming to the Geography domain.

comment: Country name from the source data.

description: Latitude of the location. Must be between -90 and 90.
Longitude of the location. Must be between -180 and 180.
